mapper.select: SELECT T1.ITEMNO, T1.ITEMNAME, T1.ITEMPRICE, T1.ITEMQTY, SUM(T1.ORDERCNT) ORDERCNT FROM (SELECT ITEM.ITEMNO,ITEM.ITEMNAME,ITEM.ITEMPRICE,ITEM.ITEMQTY, ITEMORDER.ORDERCNT FROM ITEM, ITEMORDER WHERE ITEM.ITEMNO = ITEMORDER.ITEMNO) T1 GROUP BY T1.ITEMNO, T1.ITEMNAME, T1.ITEMPRICE, T1.ITEMQTY
